alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Tippah, northwestern Prentiss and southwestern Alcorn Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ripley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ripley, Blue Mountain, Jumpertown, Gravestown, Falkner, Dumas, Kossuth, Murry, Hightown, Collinstown, Crumtown, Blackland, Clarysville, Whitten Town, Peoples and Tiplersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
